inlineContent.text: An optional value that the operation adds to the sum of weighted pixels before it applies the divisor.

abstract.text: Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
A type for a planar, 32-bits-per-channel, floating-point pixel.
Filter an image by convolving it with custom and high-speed kernels.
An enumeration that acts as a namespace for Swift overlays to vImage.
A 2D matrix that represents a convolution kernel.
Constants that specify edge modes for convolution operations.
An image buffer that stores an imageâ€™s pixel data, dimensions, bit depth, and number of channels.
Convolves a 32-bit multiple plane pixel buffer.
Convolves a floating-point 16-bit planar pixel buffer.
Convolves a floating-point 16-bit-per-channel, 4-channel interleaved pixel buffer.
Convolves an 8-bit multiple plane pixel buffer.
Convolves an 8-bit-per-channel, 4-channel interleaved pixel buffer with separate kernels for each channel.
